Merchandise area in lobby. Merchandise count-in is 2 hours prior to doors. No stickers... not for
sale, free, not after show. We have put a lot of time and effort into rebuilding the Agora and
want it to remain in its current beautiful condition. There-fore we are a sticker free venue. If you
need a merch seller the fee is $150 if the house sells above $10 per-head the fee bumps to
$200.

name: Mercury Lounge
address: 217 East Houston Street, New York, NY, USA

productionInfo.loadIn:
The load-in door for the Downstairs/Sonia is behind the club on Green Street (which runs
parallel to Mass. Ave), just before Brookline Ave. For headliners, please arrive by 4pm (unless
advanced otherwise) in order to give yourself enough time to load-in and park.
NOTE: Past experience tells us that all performers playing New York the night before your
appearance at The Middle East should
productionInfo.parking:
Unfortunately, due to the fact that we are located in the middle of Cambridge and we do not
have a parking lot, The Middle East cannot guarantee parking.
There is free lot, paid lot, and metered parking in the Central Square area. Meters are free after
6pm on weekdays, on Sundays, and on legal holidays. In addition, there is an affordable parking
garage on Green Street.

productionInfo.loadIn: Fork from truck to dock

productionInfo.moreInfo:
Nice venue but house audio was a complete mess. Only 1 tech showed up, 1.5 hours late and hungover/still drunk. House desks were not even set up and they couldn’t figure out how to set up drive lines at FOH until halfway through scheduled soundcheck. 

House LD didn’t have a patch sheet for the house lights and when asked to provide one create a crappy sheet with errors

name: Radius
address: Chicago, IL, USA

productionInfo.loadIn: Fork off your semi through a roll-up garage door. Direct push to the stage. Stage has two roll-up doors upstage approx. 20’ wide by 15’ high.
productionInfo.parking: Room for a tour bus and a semi
productionInfo.housePower: Lx is a dedicated 400A.
productionInfo.lightingPackage: Mac vipers, Auras, elation Dtw blinders, elation protrons, chauvet lekos.

name: Roadrunner Boston
address: 89 Guest Street, Boston, MA, USA

productionInfo.loadIn: Up an elevator or through the front door up multiple flights of stairs if the item won’t fit through the elevator (larger than 8’)
productionInfo.parking: Tour bus parking behind venue in ally. Semis live out front on the main road. If typically if advanced, they will reserve spots for tour semis, transportation on the main road and in the ally.
productionInfo.housePower: Lighting has a 200A cam tie in upstage right. See house LX tech for tie-in
productionInfo.micPackage: General. House has a mic package to use if needed.
productionInfo.monDesk: Avid venue (very tight monitor position. Only room for the desk and you.)
productionInfo.lightingPackage: Grid of lights over the dance floor. Upstage and midstage truss. Blinders, profiles, spots and strobes in the venue. Architectural lighting as well can be controlled as well.
productionInfo.video: Upstage video wall. No operator if your a touring band booked through Bowery. EDM acts usually have an operator.
productionInfo.rigging: Pipe on the us truss for backdrops. Nothing to hang points from other than that.
productionInfo.moreInfo: Great location in Boston. You can easily have time to go out and walk around a bit if you have a quick load-in / sound check.
